Query: How to compare two dates in a shell?

Answers.MP Summary: print or set the system date and time

so_52878320: Comparing two dates in Linux bash shell script
ul_502208: How to compare two dates in bash script?
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_502208: date +%s

if [ $(date +%s -r file) -ge $(date +%s) ]; then 
    # do something
fi

Explanations about Options.-r: display the last modification time of FILE
Explanations about Options.-d: display time described by STRING, not 'now'

au_514105: join -t ":" username contacts

join -t ":" <(sort -b username) <(sort -b contacts)
